result.html: Bhuaigh muid an cluicheWe won the game.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuaiġ muid an cluiċeWe won the game.

result.eng: We played a game of football.
result.html: D'imir muid cluiche peileWe played a game of football.
result.ponchtml: D'imir muid cluiċe peileWe played a game of football.

result.eng: The game stopped in the middle of the play.
result.ga: Stop an cluiche i lár na himeartha
result.orig: Stop an cluiche i lár na himeartha
result.html: Stop an cluiche i lár na himearthaThe game stopped in the middle of the play.
result.ponchtml: Stop an cluiċe i lár na himearṫaThe game stopped in the middle of the play.

result.html: Tá an cluiche thartThe game is over.
result.ponchtml: Tá an cluiċe ṫartThe game is over.

result.ga: Tá muid in ann an cluiche seo a bhuachan
result.orig: Tá muid in ann an cluiche seo a bhuachan
result.html: Tá muid in ann an cluiche seo a bhuachanWe can win this game.
result.ponchtml: Tá muid in ann an cluiċe seo a ḃuaċanWe can win this game.

result.eng: Do you play snooker? No I don't. The odd game of pool in the pub, that's all.
result.ga: An mbíonn tú ag imirt snúcair Ní bhím Corrchluiche púil sa bpub sin an méid
result.orig: An mbíonn tú ag imirt snúcair Ní bhím Corrchluiche púil sa bpub sin an méid
result.html: An mbíonn tú ag imirt snúcair Ní bhím Corrchluiche púil sa bpub sin an méidDo you play snooker? No I don't. The odd game of pool in the pub, that's all.
result.ponchtml: An mbíonn tú ag imirt snúcair Ní ḃím Corrċluiċe púil sa bpub sin an méidDo you play snooker? No I don't. The odd game of pool in the pub, that's all.

result.html: Cluiche fadálach atá annIt's a tedious game.
result.ponchtml: Cluiċe fadálaċ atá annIt's a tedious game.

result.eng: I enjoy a good game of poker.
result.ga: Bainim an-sásamh as cluiche maith pócair
result.orig: Bainim an-sásamh as cluiche maith pócair
result.html: Bainim an-sásamh as cluiche maith pócairI enjoy a good game of poker.
result.ponchtml: Bainim an-sásaṁ as cluiċe maiṫ pócairI enjoy a good game of poker.
